ygData.subject: Re: level of evil eyes in runnyeye
ygData.msgSnippet: Which evil eye was it?  At 29th, I could solo them with my pet.  And close without.  They were almost always green to me, except the Lords.  They were barely
ygData.messageBody:
Which evil eye was it? At 29th, I could solo them with my pet. And close
without. They were almost always green to me, except the Lords. They were
barely blue. All you need to cast to kill it is your DD spell twice. The
only thing is, they like to knock you back with their spells, effectively
interupting your spell. If it was the King, then I'm not sure. Didn't see
him spawn while I was there.

In a group of 3 I know that lvl 20's can take them out. The only real
danger is if they concentrate on one. They have pretty hefty DD spells, and
the Lords love to charm (resisted 3 of them while my pet beat them down).

Tykken



----- Original Message -----
From: "Barry Senowitz" <BarryS@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 02, 1999 9:18 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] level of evil eyes in runnyeye


> From: Barry Senowitz <BarryS@...>
>
> What level are the evil eyes in runnyeye?
>
> I'm 34th and have the 34th pet and one took me out REALLY quick; what
spells
> do these guys cast, I saw something about my skin igniting.

tolerated
